title: The Battle for the City
description: Edward leads a group of rebels in a daring attack on the city, fighting against the vampires and their minions. Lila fights alongside Edward, using her unique abilities to take down the enemy.

sections.name: The Rebel Alliance Forms
sections.description: Edward gathers a group of rebels in the hidden market, where they discuss their plan to attack the city. Lila joins the meeting, offering her help and expertise. The group decides on a strategy, with Edward leading the charge against the vampires.

sections.name: The Battle Begins
sections.description: Edward and his rebels launch their attack on the city, fighting against the vampires and their minions. Lila uses her powers to take down several vampires, while Edward fights off others with his scissorhands.

sections.name: Lila's Moment of Truth
sections.description: Lila confronts Caspian, who has arrived on the scene to counterattack. She refuses to fight against Edward and his rebels, choosing instead to side with them. This moment marks a turning point in the battle.
